Statutory authority: Public Service Law, art. 2, §§ 4[1], 30-53, 66 [1], 80[1]
In chapter 186 of the Laws of 1995, the Legislature amended

Public Service Law section 52, the shared meter law, and directed the
commission to promulgate rules necessary to conform with the amended law, including addition of some new provisions. In the interest of streamlining
regulations, provisions of Public Service Law section 52, not relevant to these
additions, are not repeated herein. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
